title: EcoMeet — Social Events Platform
description: EcoMeet is a full-stack web app that promotes eco-friendly and social development events. Built with React, Firebase Auth, Node.js, and MongoDB, it allows users to create, join, and manage community events with secure authentication and a clean, responsive UI. The goal was to learn real-world authentication, protected routing, CRUD operations, and to build something meaningful that encourages positive community action.
keyFeatures: Future-only date selection using React DatePicker
Responsive UI with dark/light mode toggle

title: TaskNest — Freelance Task Marketplace
description: TaskNest is a full-stack freelance marketplace where users can post tasks, bid on projects, and manage freelance workflows. Built using React, Firebase, Node.js, and MongoDB, the platform supports user roles, protected routes, CRUD operations, and a responsive UI with task filtering, bidding, and featured sliders. The project was designed to simulate real-world freelance platforms and showcase dynamic data handling with authentication.
keyFeatures: Task posting with title, description, category, budget, deadline
View tasks with filters and categories
Featured Task Slider showcasing top projects
CRUD operations for tasks and bids
Responsive UI with dark/light mode toggle
Backend built with Express.js and MongoDB

title: BD Lawyer — Legal Services Platform
description: BD Lawyer is a legal services web app built to connect users in Bangladesh with qualified lawyers across multiple specialties. Using React, Firebase, and MongoDB, the platform allows users to search, filter, and book appointments with lawyers while enabling lawyers to manage their profiles and availability. The project focuses on real-world service booking functionality with secure authentication and a clean, responsive design.
keyFeatures: Firebase authentication with user and lawyer roles
Lawyer directory with filtering by category
Lawyer dashboard to manage availability and bookings
Responsive layout with dark/light mode toggle
Built with React, Tailwind, Firebase, and MongoDB

title: AppStore — Full-Featured App Marketplace
description: AppStore is a dynamic marketplace website where users can browse, search, and discover apps with detailed info like downloads, ratings, and developer profiles. Built with React, Firebase, and MongoDB, it features user authentication, protected routes, app filtering by category, and a responsive UI designed for seamless user experience.
keyFeatures: Browse and search apps with filters by category and rating
Dynamic app details including thumbnails, banners, downloads, and reviews
Protected routes for user profiles and app management
Backend API using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB
